name.value: Visit the Github repository for more information

description.value: EntryDescription is a subclass of OpaqueData. The purpose behind this is that there are certain textual fields that some CTS2 service implementations may want constrain. As an example, Designation text is of type \\ EntryDescription, but implementations may want to restrict the OpaqueData value attribute to a simple string rather than xs:anyType. When OpaqueData appears directly as a model element, implementations must be able to support the full OpaqueData model. EntryDescription, however, may be constrained by implementations or specialized PSMs.

definition.value: EntryDescription is a subclass of OpaqueData. The purpose behind this is that there are certain textual fields that some CTS2 service implementations may want constrain. As an example, Designation text is of type \\ EntryDescription, but implementations may want to restrict the OpaqueData value attribute to a simple string rather than xs:anyType. When OpaqueData appears directly as a model element, implementations must be able to support the full OpaqueData model. EntryDescription, however, may be constrained by implementations or specialized PSMs.
